topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557383436368720ca400000e#post_557383436368720ca400000e
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5573835863687221fd0012f5#post_5573835863687221fd0012f5
I showed him Splatoon. His exact words were "Okay, this game is weird but those squid things are kind of cute." We then had like a twenty minute discussion about porn. We both seem to agree that in the grand scheme of things porn is actually very beneficial in that it has destroyed the stigma surrounding sex and sexuality. Then we started throwing gummy worms at each other because we're both immature as all hell.
